issue.description: Summary/Abstract/Keywords: person/organization id and role Problem Description: ARM-person maps to AIM-person. Since AIM-person has a mandatory attribute "id" this attribute must also be available on the ARM level. AIM organization has an optional id. So this attribute must be optional in the ARM. There are many cases when no id is given but only the name of an organization. Another major problem is with attribute role of person_in_organization. This role may not be known. On the other hand it also can happen that a particular person has different roles in an organization. Conditions Under Which the Issue Was Discovered: Implementing this module Proposed Solution (Optional): - Add mandatory attribute "id" to person (ARM) - Make organization.id optional (ARM). - Make Person_in_organization.role optional - Extend UNIQUE role in Person_in_organization to include role.
